str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A giving, gift, donation. From the base of didomi; a giving; by implication, a gift.
And, even, also, namely.
From telos; complete; neuter completeness.
A gift, bounty. From doreomai; a bestowment.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From ano; from above; by analogy, from the first; by implication, anew.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Contraction for the third person singular present indicative of eneimi; impersonally, there is in or among.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A change, variation, mutation. From a compound of para and allasso; transmutation, i.e. fickleness: variableness.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A turning, change, mutation. From an apparently primary trepo to turn; a turn, i.e. Revolution.
From a compound of apo and a derivative of skia; a shading off, i.e. Obscuration.
